# The `simplify_type` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Define a template that can be specialized by smart pointers to reflect the fact that they are automatically dereferenced, and are not involved with the template selection process... the default implementation is a noop. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename From&gt;
struct llvm::simplify_type&lt;From&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Define a template that can be specialized by smart pointers to reflect the fact that they are automatically dereferenced, and are not involved with the template selection process... the default implementation is a noop.

Definition at line 34 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/casting-h">Casting.h</a>.
